      • getDocString

        public static java.lang.String getDocString(java.lang.String s)
        Answers with the first java doc style comment in the string, or an empty string if no such comment can be found.

      • writeTemplate

        public static void writeTemplate(java.io.File template,
                 java.io.File output,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> fields)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Reads in a simple template file, with fields of the form '@@somekey@@' and replaces each field with the value in the map for 'somekey', writing the output to the output file. Keys not in the map will be replaced with empty strings.
        Parameters:
        template - File object mapping to the template
        output - File object handle to the output
        args - template keys, data values to replace them
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when there are problems writing to or from the files

      • build

        public boolean build(java.io.File bin)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     SketchException
        Builds the sketch

        The process goes a little something like this: 1. rm -R bin/* 2. cat *.pde > bin/sketchname.pde 3. cp -r sketch/data/* bin/ (p.js doesn't recognize the data folder) 4. series of greps to find height, width, name, desc 5. cat template.html | sed 's/@@sketch@@/[name]/g' ... [many sed filters] > bin/index.html

        Parameters:
        bin - the output folder for the built sketch
        Returns:
        boolean whether the build was successful
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        SketchException

      • preprocess

        public void preprocess(java.io.File bin)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       SketchException
        Collects the sketch code and runs it by the Java-mode preprocessor to fish for errors.
        Parameters:
        bin - the output folder
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        SketchException
        See Also:
        processing.mode.java.JavaBuild#preprocess(java.io.File)

      • getSketchDescription

        public java.lang.String getSketchDescription()
        Parse the sketch to retrieve it's description. Answers with the first java doc style comment in the main sketch file, or an empty string if no such comment exists.

      • export

        public boolean export()
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      SketchException
        Export the sketch to the default "web-export" folder.
        Returns:
        success of the operation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        SketchException
